title: Knoydart Pottery and Tearoom
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Take-out, Bakery, British, Scottish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A lovely tea room/cafe serves a selection of food and drink during the day and evening meals during the holiday season. There is usually a vegan soup choice and a vegan main course in the evening. Soy milk is available. Best to call in advance to let them know you will be there.
